tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (S (NP (NP (NNP Merry) (NNP Christmas)) (PP (TO to) (NP (NP (CD one)) (PP (IN of) (NP (PRP$ my) (JJS sweetest) (NNS friends)))))) (VP (VBP ~) (SBAR (S (NP (CD ~) (JJ @wickedpoptart) (NN ~) (NN ~)) (ADVP (RB truly)) (VP (VBP want) (PP (IN for) (NP (PRP$ your) (NNS holidays))))))) (. !)))
tweetSentenceList.depTree: [~/VBP nsubj>[Christmas/NNP compound>Merry/NNP nmod:to>[one/CD case>to/TO nmod:of>[friends/NNS case>of/IN nmod:poss>my/PRP$ amod>sweetest/JJS]]] ccomp>[want/VBP nsubj>[~/NN nummod>~/CD amod>@wickedpoptart/JJ compound>~/NN] advmod>truly/RB nmod:for>[holidays/NNS case>for/IN nmod:poss>your/PRP$]] punct>!/.]
